src.sql:
select OptIn,

CASE
When '[LOSM:CobOptInClick.Click]' = 'NA' Then 'dnnsf.api.tabspro.openModal({mid:544}); return false();'
When OptIn IS NULL or OptIn = '' Then 'dnnsf.api.tabspro.openModal({mid:544}); return false();'
When OptIn IS NOT NULL or OptIn <> '' Then 'return false();'

END AS Click
from app.TextOptIn
where LoanGuid = 'ab86932f-e0c0-450e-bc5a-b140dce00987' and CellPhone = '803-207-9209'
